string.description: shown if user has permission to download link

string.description: start of the string telling when link expires

string.description: button to cancel an action

string.description: button to cancel an action

string.description: shown as title of warning dialog before disabling a shared link

string.name: box_sharesdk_disable_message
string.description: shown as message of warning dialog before disabling a shared link

resources.string: Disabling the link permanently deletes the current share link. Reenabling the link will generate a completely new and unique share link. Do you wish to disable the share link?

string.description: Toast shown if there is a problem modifying the shared link

resources.string: There was a problem modifying/creating this shared link.

string.name: box_sharesdk_no_shared_link_instructions
string.description: description shown when there is no shared link enabled

resources.string: Enabling a link generates a sharable link that others can use to access and view this content.

string.description: toast after copying a link using copy link button

resources.string: I have shared \'%1$s\' with you on Box.

string.description: Title for intent chooser when choosing way to send shared content.

string.description: Title indicating that an error occurred while performing an action

string.description: Title for the alert dialog to confirm owner update

resources.string: Making this user the item owner means that you will lose ownership and become an editor. Do you want to continue?

string.name: box_sharesdk_action_send
string.description: Menu item for submitting the invite collaborators request

string.name: box_sharesdk_to
string.description: The label for the field where users will enter the collaborators they would like to invite

string.name: box_sharesdk_selected_item_not_expected_type
string.description: Error message for when an incorrect object type is used to launch the collaborations page

resources.string: The selected item was not of the expected type

string.name: box_sharesdk_collaborator_invited
string.description: Success message for inviting a collaborator

string.name: box_sharesdk_collaborators_invited
string.description: Success message for inviting collaborators

string.name: box_sharesdk_cannot_view_collaborations
string.description: Error message shown when the user does not have sufficient permissions to view the collaborations or is not available

resources.string: You cannot view the collaborations for this item.

string.name: box_sharesdk_another_person
string.description: Default name shown when a user without a Box account has been invited

string.name: box_sharesdk_no_collaborators
string.description: Message shown when no collaborators have been invited for the current item

string.name: box_sharesdk_has_already_been_invited
string.description: The string displayed when a person was already invited, %s being the email of the person

resources.string: %s has already been invited to this item

string.name: box_sharesdk_num_has_already_been_invited
string.description: The string displayed when some number of people have already been invited, %s being number of people

resources.string: %s people have already been invited to this item

string.name: box_sharesdk_item_unavailable
string.description: Error message to display when a user launches box to a file that no longer exists for their account

resources.string: The item you are trying to access has either been deleted or is unavailable to you

string.name: box_sharesdk_insufficient_permissions
string.description: Error shown if user does not have sufficient permissions for an action

resources.string: You do not have sufficient permissions for this action.

string.name: box_sharedsdk_new_owner_not_collaborator
string.desription: Error shown if user tries to change a pending invite to an owner of the folder

resources.string: User is not yet a collaborator on this folder, and cannot be set as an owner.

string.name: box_sharedsdk_unable_to_update_owner
string.description: Error shown if changing ownership fails for unknown reason

resources.string: Unable to update owner. Please contact support.

string.name: box_sharesdk_cannot_get_collaborators
string.description: Error shown when api fetching collaborators fails due to unknown reasons

resources.string: Unable to fetch collaborators. Please contact support if the issue persists.
Unable to invite collaborators. Please contact support if the issue persists.

string.name: box_sharesdk_title_remove_different_collaboration_folder
string.description: Title for the alert dialog to confirm removing a collaborator for a parent of selected item

string.name: box_sharesdk_warn_remove_different_collaboration_folder
string.description: shown as message of warning dialog before removing collaboration for a different than selected item

resources.string: This will remove %1$s from accessing all files within %2$s. Are you sure ?
